artist: David Roberts, Louis Haghe, Sir Francis Graham Moon
inscription: BL, within plate: Excavated Temple at Petra / called El Khasne, or the Treasury.
markings:
TC text: The / HOLY LAND. / Syria, Idumea, Arabia, Egypt, & Nubia. / FROM THE DRAWINGS ON THE SPOT BY  / David Roberts. R.A. / WITH HISTORICAL DESCRIPTIONS BY / THE REVD. GEROGE CROLY, L.L.D. / LITHOGRAPHS BY / LOUIS HAGHE / VOL.3. ;
BC, text: LONDON, F.G. MOON, 20 THREADNEEDLE STREET, / PUBLISHER IN ORDINARY TO HER MAJESTY, / MDCCCXLIX. / Day & Son, lithrs to the Queen
